title: Mobile Microlearning for Strengthening Competencies in Managing Cardiometabolic Diseases

context.additional_context: A corporate health management program delivered via a mobile application to ensure daily accessibility for learners.

learning_goals: Learners can explain five risk factors for cardiometabolic diseases and propose prevention strategies
Learners can establish and implement healthy meal plans and physical activity schedules at least three times weekly
Learners can maintain medication adherence and treatment plan implementation rates above 80%
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
